critique: The document pertains to the administration and operation of the Canal Zone, focusing on employment standards, merit systems, and appeals processes. It aims to ensure uniform application of standards and rights, coordinate policies, and establish a merit-based system for employment within the Canal Zone. There is a balance between federal oversight (through the Secretary of the Army and Civil Service Commission) and local administration. The document also addresses security concerns by allowing for positions to be designated for U.S. citizens for security reasons.
